inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getExport.

accepts.description: Content-type of the export. Valid values are `application/json` and `application/yaml` are supported for `export_type` `ofoas30` and `swagger`.

exportType.description: Type of export. Acceptable values are `oas30` for OpenAPI 3.0.x and `swagger` for Swagger/OpenAPI 2.0.

parameters.description: Key-value map of query string parameters that specify properties of the export. the following parameters are supported: `extensions='integrations'` or `extensions='apigateway'` will export the API with x-amazon-apigateway-integration extensions. `extensions='authorizers'` will export the API with x-amazon-apigateway-authorizer extensions.

restApiId.description: Identifier of the associated REST API.

stageName.description: Name of the Stage that will be exported.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getExport.

contentDisposition.description: Content-disposition header value in the HTTP response.

contentType.description: Content-type header value in the HTTP response.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.
